title: The Client error when Rank Ban and Pick
body: I was in Rank and doing the Ban and Pick Step but my Client get error and stop working, and when i reconnected,i get punish and lost  point, Can Riot give some solution? My ID is InfinityStardust.

replies.body:
Client errors or crashing during champ select is often caused by network settings that prevent your client from establishing a solid connection to the servers. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if that guide changed anything.
